title: How is this news?
author: VD
content_html:
From the Washington Times:

TOP STORIES

Bush, Chirac tell Syria to leave Lebanon

End of story for Hunter Thompson

Group justified by report on Soviet POWs

Virginia Senate panel kills House prayer measure

The time is now to start on your taxes

That last one sure sounds more like an editorial than a news story on the front page of the business section, doesn’t it? But while the legacy media – and I include the Washington Times – may harbor pretensions of objectivity, they reveal their true character on a daily basis to those who bother to pay attention.
content_text:
From the Washington Times:
TOP STORIES
Bush, Chirac tell Syria to leave Lebanon
End of story for Hunter Thompson
Group justified by report on Soviet POWs
Virginia Senate panel kills House prayer measure
The time is now to start on your taxes
That last one sure sounds more like an editorial than a news story on the front page of the business section, doesn’t it?  But while the legacy media – and I include the Washington Times – may harbor pretensions of objectivity, they reveal their true character on a daily basis to those who bother to pay attention.
